about.meta: Jaikalki TSP Services - Gravity DigiPayment by Jaikalki Technology Pvt Ltd
about.title: Efficient MID Solutions through TSP Services for Pay-In and Pay-Out Needs
about.description1: At Jaikalki Technology Pvt Ltd, our Gravity DigiPayment division specializes in offering Technology Service Provider (TSP) solutions to streamline the process of obtaining Merchant Identification Numbers (MIDs). We act as a bridge, connecting businesses with multiple banks and Payment Aggregator & Payment Gateway (PAPG) companies to ensure seamless onboarding and efficient payment processing solutions.
about.description2: Our TSP services simplify the complexities of merchant onboarding by leveraging partnerships with top banks and PAPG companies. Whether you need a Pay-In or Pay-Out solution, we ensure that your business is equipped with the right tools to receive and disburse payments securely and efficiently.
about.description3: With a dedicated Relationship Officer assigned to your business, we guide you through every step of the MID acquisition process. From document submission to integration with payment systems, we provide end-to-end support, ensuring that your business is ready to handle transactions quickly and reliably.

features.name: Seamless Bank and PAPG Integration
features.description: We connect your business with top banks and PAPG companies to streamline the MID acquisition process, ensuring smooth onboarding.

features.name: End-to-End Merchant Onboarding Support
features.description: Our team manages the entire onboarding process, from documentation to integration, saving you time and effort.

features.name: Dedicated Relationship Officer
features.description: A dedicated officer ensures you get personalized support throughout the MID acquisition journey.

features.name: Efficient Pay-In and Pay-Out Solutions
features.description: Our TSP services enable secure and efficient payment collection and disbursement tailored to your business needs.

features.title: Why Choose Jaikalki Technology Pvt Ltd as Your TSP Partner?
features.subtitle: Partner with Gravity DigiPayment to simplify MID acquisition and payment solutions for your business.

leftColumn.title: Strong Bank & PAPG Partnerships
leftColumn.description: We collaborate with leading banks and PAPG companies to provide robust payment solutions tailored to your needs.

leftColumn.title: Streamlined MID Acquisition
leftColumn.description: Our TSP services simplify the process of obtaining Merchant Identification Numbers, ensuring quick and hassle-free onboarding.

leftColumn.title: Flexible Payment Solutions
leftColumn.description: We offer flexible Pay-In and Pay-Out solutions that support multiple payment methods and scale with your business.

leftColumn.title: Expert Guidance & Support
leftColumn.description: Our experienced Relationship Officers provide expert guidance to ensure a smooth onboarding and payment process.

rightColumn.title: Customized Payment Integration
rightColumn.description: Our TSP services integrate seamlessly with your existing systems, allowing for efficient and customized payment flows.

rightColumn.title: Real-Time Monitoring & Reporting
rightColumn.description: Track and monitor transactions in real-time with detailed reports for better financial management.

rightColumn.title: 24/7 Support for Merchants
rightColumn.description: We provide round-the-clock support to resolve issues and ensure uninterrupted payment operations.
